content:
Today, at night, the forces of defense have destroyed 14 out of 16 enemy UAVs, all in the Odessa region.

About thisreportedAir Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

On the night of March 17, Russian invaders hit 5 anti-aircraft guided missiles C-300 in Kharkiv and Donetsk region, two managed aviation missiles X-59 to Chernihiv and 16 shock UAVs like ShahED (areas of lacer plots-Cape Chaud, Crimea).

As a result of combat work, 14 "Shahmed" within the Odessa region was shot.

Air Air Force and Land Forces, Mobile Fire Groups of Defense Forces of Ukraine were involved in the reflection of the air attack.
title: In Odessa, 14 "Shahmed" - the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine was shot down at night
description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. On the night of March 17, Russian invaders ...
author: Army Inform
